author: Allie Merriam
title: The Ultimate Celebrity Wedding Gallery
text: Ana-Bunny 5 years hahah It is really funny to see how some people get upset over these pictures... jeez. who cares if they are now divorced, remarried or whatever. We can still look back at their wedding pictures... Just cuz they made the decision of getting divorced doesn't mean we have to behave as if they never got married. I bet most of people are Angelina fans who are just upset to see Brad and Jennifers picture. They were a lovely Hollywood couple, theyare not together anymore but their relationships we be always remebered/ msshellokitty 5 years I agree..Please get rid of the anon post.I have not posted in a very long time because the site is just not the same anymore.I bet a lot of loyal people are gone.I enjoyed getting points,playing the games,etc.I don't get why there are so many hostile anon post now. POP - please get rid of the anonymous comments. They are destroying this website. Related Posts
